review: Movie is just OK. Vishal Pandya did a good direction and Songs in the movie were too good and awesome. Sushant Singh looks badass in his role and one of the cruel villains ever. BGM by Sunny and Inder Bawra was good. But what lacks here is good screenplay. Screenplay needed a good treatment but sadly screenplay is sort of average. But still you don't get disappointed with the movie.
